languages.text: {n}Прикрыв глаза, Ульфар веско заявляет:{/n} "Для этого тебе пришлось бы уговорить сразу две очень несговорчивых персоны. Меня и клешнерукого ксеноса".
{n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."
languages.original_text: {n}Прикрыв глаза, Ульфар веско заявляет:{/n} "Для этого тебе пришлось бы уговорить сразу две очень несговорчивых персоны. Меня и клешнерукого ксеноса".

traits.locale_text: {n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."
{n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."
{n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."
{n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."

languages.text: {n}他眯起了眼睛，以沉重的声音开了口。{/n}“如果想让我帮忙，你必须说服两个非常顽固的家伙。一个是我，另一个是把我关在这里的人，那个手上长着爪子的异形。”
languages.original_text: {n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}他眯起了眼睛，以沉重的声音开了口。{/n}“如果想让我帮忙，你必须说服两个非常顽固的家伙。一个是我，另一个是把我关在这里的人，那个手上长着爪子的异形。”

languages.text: {n}彼は目を細めて重々しく言う。{/n}「仲間にしたいならふたり説得してみろ。俺と、俺を捕らえたあのかぎ爪の異種族だ」
languages.original_text: {n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は目を細めて重々しく言う。{/n}「仲間にしたいならふたり説得してみろ。俺と、俺を捕らえたあのかぎ爪の異種族だ」

languages.text: {n}Con ojos entrecerrados y tono solemne, afirma:{/n} «Para conseguir lo que quiere tendrá que convencer a dos individuos muy testarudos. A mí y a mi captor, el xenos con garras por manos».
languages.original_text: {n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con ojos entrecerrados y tono solemne, afirma:{/n} «Para conseguir lo que quiere tendrá que convencer a dos individuos muy testarudos. A mí y a mi captor, el xenos con garras por manos».

languages.text: {n}Il vous répond sur un ton grave, les yeux plissés :{/n} « Pour obtenir ce que vous voulez, il vous faudra convaincre deux individus particulièrement bornés : moi-même et mon geôlier, le xénos à griffes. »
languages.original_text: {n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous répond sur un ton grave, les yeux plissés :{/n} « Pour obtenir ce que vous voulez, il vous faudra convaincre deux individus particulièrement bornés : moi-même et mon geôlier, le xénos à griffes. »

languages.text: {n}Mit schmalen Augen sagt er bedeutungsschwer:{/n} "Um zu erhalten, was Ihr wollt, müsst Ihr zwei sehr starrsinnige Personen überzeugen – mich und meinen Peiniger, den Xenos mit den Klauen."
languages.original_text: {n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit schmalen Augen sagt er bedeutungsschwer:{/n} "Um zu erhalten, was Ihr wollt, müsst Ihr zwei sehr starrsinnige Personen überzeugen – mich und meinen Peiniger, den Xenos mit den Klauen."

languages.original_text: {n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."

languages.text: {n}Kısık gözlerle ağır ağır konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İstediğini almak için kafasının dikine giden iki kişiyi ikna etmen gerek: Beni ve beni zapt eden şu pençeden bozma elleri olan zenoyu."
languages.original_text: {n}With narrowed eyes, he says weightily,{/n} "To get what you want, you will have to convince two very headstrong individuals — me and my captor, that claw-handed xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısık gözlerle ağır ağır konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İstediğini almak için kafasının dikine giden iki kişiyi ikna etmen gerek: Beni ve beni zapt eden şu pençeden bozma elleri olan zenoyu."
